website_summaries.verdict: A well-designed hearing aid that is easy to use but doesn't have the same level of quality as higher-priced models.
pros: A great price, especially considering the 500-hr
battery life, good warranty, and effective noise reduction
cons: It can be difficult to find the best volume setting in crowded environments
Not a true hearing aid, this merely amplifies sounds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better and more reliable than the $2,000+ hearing aid she purchased from the audiologist!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Tempted to buy these?  DON’T!
customer_reviews.text: They don’t come with instructions, so adjusting the programs is a guessing game. I’ve tried many times to make them work for me to no avail. Britzgo simply doesn’t live up to the description. It amplifies sound to a degree in a quiet room to watch TV, but in all other situations, especially talking on the phone trying to use them is an exercise in frustration. Furthermore, the stated battery life is grossly exaggerated. Last, but not least, their appearance couldn’t be more unsightly. I regret that I kept trying to get them to work past the return date, so I’ve just wasted dollars on a truly worthless product.
customer_reviews.author: Voltaire

customer_reviews.title: Great Aid for Better Hearing
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my regular hearing aids. My regular aids do not work well in a classroom environment, because of poor acoustics, but I tried this & it was perfect. Now I can hear the speaker better & also pickup others that participate in the conversations. This device is extremely sensitive to wind or noisy background environment, ie restaurants. Too many conversations & clanging of dishes/utensils, even on lowest setting. Carry it with me at all times & wear when my normal hearing aids do not work well. Reason for not giving 5-star is because this device is very large & bulky compared to my normal hearing aids.
customer_reviews.author: Walter A. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: the audio cable that comes out of the hearing aid ...
customer_reviews.text: the audio cable that comes out of the hearing aid to the mold can break down with the passage of months, it only lasts 4 months and it can be without sound. see attached image.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Caballero

customer_reviews.title: reliablity
customer_reviews.text: The Britzgo is a major breakthrough because it will operate on 1.5 volt. This extends the battery life to a week or more. However I have two that have failed in the last six month. I bought new ones because I can't find anything better. It need a smaller speaker and a way to visually determine the volume setting. That is the reason for a rotating knob on most audio amplifiers. I am a retired electrical engineer. Paul Lamar
customer_reviews.author: william L.

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been complaining for a long time that I can't hear. lol I say he mumbles but that's another story. I've needed some kind of help with my hearing for a long time but too stubborn to spend that kind of money at a doctor's office. I thought I'd try this out first to see if it helped. It does amplify but is a little too loud. I can't turn the volume down low enough to wear it in the car with my hubby. It's a nice unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Godsinger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy back ground, was not able to adjust to remove noise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud noises were overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Mom never could get it adjusted to work for her; if she used it at a level to work for conversation, any loud noise was overwhelming; broke down and bought a $900 one at Costco...she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Eugene

customer_reviews.title: She says she can hear much better and it is so comfortable tha t she forgets ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 84 year old mother. She has expensive hearing aids, but they didn't work very well and were uncomfortable. She loves this device. She says she can hear much better and it is so comfortable tha t she forgets she is even wearing it. Worth every penny !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Britzgo hearing
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work for me, not able to hear with it, but the company was excellent in refunding my money, I received refund within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: shellbell

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST EVER FOR HEARING !!!
customer_reviews.text: These are THE BEST hearing amplifier. My husband has expensive hearing aids and having terrible problems hearing. With our insurance,he is due every 3 years for new ones. We didn’t have the money outright sooo I saw the ad for Nano. I checked Amazon and they sold these. My husband is wearing.the Nano and can hear perfectly. He is surprised how clear these are. Can be used on either ear,has on,off switch with memory and comes with 4 frequency memory presets. Excellent price. We are sooo happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last year for my mom and it worked well during that time. It stopped working suddenly this year and I reordered the same one since my mom seemed to like this over the other ones she tried. I popped in new batteries that came with the device and it worked for a few minutes before it stopped working. I also tried several batteries that I had purchased for the other device without any luck. I attempted to contacted Britzgo and have yet to hear back from them (it's been a week already). Very disappointed in customer service and quality. Don't waste your time or money with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Thu H. Pham

customer_reviews.title: This one not for watching TV.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandmother. I tried all possible modes and sound settings, but did not achieve the desired result. My goal was specifically to watch TV for my grandmother, with whom this hearing aid could not cope. Sounds and voices from the TV merge and nothing is clear, it is easier just without this device and make it louder. I bought and very cheap hearing aids for $ 10-20. The result was the same. I will not say that this thing is of sufficient quality. In general, we did not like.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this amplifier for over a year now, and quite frankly it does nothing for my hearing. It does not perform as I had hoped, and is irritating because of the non stop surrounding noise that I cannot block out. I have tinnitus, and when wearing this device that's all I can hear, literally blasting in my ear. I had hoped that it would help my hearing problem, but just not so.
customer_reviews.author: pva

customer_reviews.title: Best value and quality on the internet. Try and you will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I can hear again. Love that I can control this so easily. Battery life is great and so easy to use. I used the smallest ear insert and I forget that it’s in. I am not being paid for this review. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Blair

customer_reviews.title: A huge help for me at work
customer_reviews.text: This has been a huge help for me at work in meetings to make sure I'm not missing anything and for talking to soft-spoken coworkers. And I keep it on its lowest setting so it's even more powerful than I've needed to use it. It has a tinny quality to the sound but for the help it gives I can live with that. Definitely less expensive than prescription hearing aids. I can't make a prediction how it would work for someone with worse hearing than me, but I'll buy again if this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great device for hearing loss
customer_reviews.text: I got so tired of my husband telling me he didn't hear me, that I bought him one of these hearing amplifiers for Christmas. He drove heavy equipment for 10 years. To my surprise, he kept working with the device until he got the volume adjusted. He did have to take it off when our guests at Christmas day got louder, but he kept going back to it. He wears it everyday now. He can hear me,too...which is always important...right?
customer_reviews.author: Terry W-C

customer_reviews.title: Works better than $6,600 hearing aids!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this hearing aid for my 98 year old mother-in-law. She is currently testing ($99/month rental) $6,600 hearing aids for purchase. She was still having trouble hearing, even after adjustment by the audiologist. Tried one of the BHA-220. She says this one works better! Now ordering another for the other ear. While these are physically bigger than the outrageously expensive ones, what is important to her is being able to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have this amplifier for a bit and have had the opportunity to use it, I want to praise it to the skies. For me, the results have been amazing. I'm not missing things anymore. Since I turn it off when I'm not using it, I would imagine I'll get a bit more mileage out of the battery than someone who has it in use all the time. I most assuredly would recommend this to anyone who simply needs to turn up the volumn in their ear(s) a bit.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...you might like it
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to amplify only the high frequency sounds. The lowest volume setting was way too loud for me. The function button served no discernible purpose. Your hearing might be different. If this sounds right to you ...go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great amplifier and I believe hearing aids are a major rip off.
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier. I wore the device around the house for about a week, per the suggestion of the manufacturer, and was delighted to be able to hear the TV without having to raise the volume. A week later, I wore it to a restaurant and was delighted to be able to distinctly hear my boyfriend's voice and not have to continually ask him to repeat himself. There is another model by Britzco I may try out which digitally modifies background noise. However, at the present I am very satisfied and have passed along the word to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Roccinante

customer_reviews.title: ya get what ya pay for
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy em. I did after reading reviews and wish I didn't. They constantly get ringing sound and grandmother hated em. Going to Sam's club to pay 600 for something better. But hey I thought I'd give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Worst product arrogant seller
customer_reviews.text: Worst product and arrogant seller. I bought this for my Dad. In less than couple of months it went bad. We tried new battery and nothing. Seller is giving hard time to come up with a solution. I will highly recommend not to buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak

customer_reviews.title: Gives me much better hearing now!
customer_reviews.text: Have found that adding this unit to my right ear has brought up my ability to hear to a higher level. For a long time I have used only one hearing device for my nearly all deaf left ear. My right ear hears much better without a device. But to improve my overall hearing I decided to check out the effectiveness of the Bzitzgo Amplifier. It does not go up high enough for me but as a secondary device, it helps a great deal to give me all around hearing. My other old device is a $20 chargeable amplifier that happens to go up very high for hearing. So together they help me a great deal. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Price

customer_reviews.title: The ear bands were not a good fit either
customer_reviews.text: It did amplify sound for my grandpa who is hard of hearing but he complained that the sound it amplified was muffled.The mode switch did not seem to make a difference. We tried tuning it but the sounds went from very muffled to slightly less muffled. The ear bands were not a good fit either. We tried every single ear band length for him and it still would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: A Temporary Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My mother lost her hearing aid when she was in ICU and it will take a month before her replacement to arrive. Unlike her old mini set, this one is not “invisible” but it is a good temporary replacement for her. It is easy to use and it serves the purpose. With this, she can carry the conversation when face to face but it doesn’t work quite well on the phone though. For a friction of the price of her prescribed mini hearing aid, this is better than nothing and it works so far. (Fingers crossed!)
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: I can hear
customer_reviews.text: It has taken some time getting use to the ear piece but it really works. My hearing loss is volume so this works just like I need. It took a little bit to get use to and getting the settings correct for the environment I was in, but with a little practice I learned how to adjust the settings. I'm pleased and recommend you do as the instructions say and wear only a couple of hours a day and work your way up with time so you get use to the system.
customer_reviews.author: jah

customer_reviews.title: Can hear better than with the hearing aids
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough positive things about this amplifier. My 84 year old mother kept losing and breaking her hearing aids. We decided to try this and she loves it. Can hear better than with the hearing aids, the batteries last far longer (and are easier to change), plus with the color of the device, it's easier for her to find when she doesn't put it in the case. And if she loses it ... well, this is far cheaper than hearing aids! The sound quality is excellent and the device was delivered quickly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately failed
customer_reviews.text: Worked adequatley for couple months. Then it jsut failed. Totally disappointed. As i needed some hearing amplification, i moved up to the Britzgo BHA-603D
customer_reviews.author: Otis Maximus williams

customer_reviews.title: Not enough earbud sizes, Need CS phone number
customer_reviews.text: I am currently in the hospital with unexpected hearing loss due to severe congestion. Fluid is supposed to drain on its own but hasn’t. 7 weeks of this darn problem. This thing would be worth its weight in gold except the smallest ear bud is still too big for my ear canal, so it beeps constantly from losing air as it pushes back out. If I get it just right, I can hear but it’s a constant struggle in a difficult situation. If anyone knows customer service number for Britzgo, or where to find compatible smaller earbuds, I would be very appreciative.
customer_reviews.author: Seafarer2844

customer_reviews.title: It amplifies.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it will. When you are wearing it you won't notice it except for very low level static. After wearing it for a while and then removing it, I am amazed at how much quieter the world is. I bought this primarily because I am married and also to a lesser extend because I am a teacher. It is also thousands cheaper than a real hearing aid.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: Hearing is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. I can hear like when I was younger. I'm still fine tuning the device but I really like it a lot. Ear piece was perfect out of the box. High quality work shows in assembly and it's carrying case. Thanks "Britzgo" for giving me hearing again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality & best price you’ll ever find.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought about eight of these for little old ladies I love and in my Sunday School class. Most of them given anonymously. So cool to hear them say that it was better than their 2000 dollar ones that had quit on them. Said the quality was astounding & so easy to set. I am privileged to give the gift of hearing because of these great prices.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Does not retain program setting when turned off and on.
customer_reviews.text: This hearing amplifier works fine, and I can hear the difference between the 4 programs: (1) wide frequency, (2) low frequency, (3) high frequency, and (4) medium frequency. However, when I turn the unit off and back on, it always goes back to Program 1, no matter what I set it to, even though the instructions say "The Amplifier will retain the volume and program settings for next use. This is very inconvenient, especially for an older person who will have trouble pushing the tiny button to change the program.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Westfield

customer_reviews.title: Very, very small parts
customer_reviews.text: Parts are too small for elderly parents to use. Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: K. G. Ballew

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn hearing aids all my life .... recently my $2000 dollar aid stopped working, I have hearing loss in both ears but only had one because of the price. I purchased this Britzgo in desperation so I can hear until I could get something new. Well I’m so impressed with the quality, especially for the price, I ordered another one for my other ear and just may forgo the ridiculous expense of hearing aids. I need to add that I’m using the domes I use for my other hearing aids they fit my ears better. With that said, they fit perfectly on the stem, giving you more options. Thanks Britzgo for providing a quality alternative.
customer_reviews.author: pba

customer_reviews.title: Defective piece - low quality and waste of time!
customer_reviews.text: The product shipped was a defective piece, and when my father tried this there was no way to select different modes. Looks like the quality of the product is too low and now I need to return this back to Amazon! Waste of time, effort and peace of mind! (Wanted to see my father’s smile, instead...)
customer_reviews.author: Praveen Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Quick Fix Workable Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My expensive hearing aid broke after several years so I tried this hearing aid as a quick fix. This low cost hearing aid works will in amplifying sound in a quiet setting making one-on-one conversation hearable It doesn't work so well in a busy restaurant as there as so many sounds which mix & become louder (easy fix - remove hearing aid while in a noisy place). I especially like using this in my home and weekend 'Bed & Breakfast' as I can clearly hear my guests - which is just what I was looking for....it also works well with the television so I don't have to turn it up so loud.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Great Amplifier
customer_reviews.text: My mom just received the amplifier from Fed Ex, we read the packaging, put one in her ear and she can already hear much better! I'm so happy for both of us! She can hear better, and for me, no more repeating myself over and over! If anything changes, I'll add a note.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Livingston

customer_reviews.title: There have to be better choices
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Tried all settings and it amplified everything. Doesn't seem to do the job of filtering, at least for me. Very nice looking appliance, but not good for me. The return policy worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User 35313

customer_reviews.title: They work until they dont!  No repair beyond warranty, be aware!
customer_reviews.text: I have used britzgo bha220 for several years and have been satisfied with caveats noted by others that theses are not hearing aids and should not be judged in comparison with very much more expensive instruments. My problem now is that three of the 4 sets are inoperative and I have been told by Britzgo these cannot be fixed or replaced I am a sr citizen veteran on fixed income and need these for daily use. If you buy these and ,they do work, ask about longer term support beyond rhe warranty period. There is none be aware
customer_reviews.author: ralph thayer

customer_reviews.title: I can hear sounds from miles away
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for hunting so that I could hear game. I can hear trains, cars. airplanes, screaming birds and squirrels, leaves crashing into the ground, my stomach grumbling, mosquitos, WIND. Lots of noise. So much noise, that it is hard to zone in on any particular thing. It does have settings. Maybe this unit is just not made for someone with normal hearing. Your ear drums will crack if you try and use it in the house with people talking and tv's and creaking doors. They work, they just work too good...no way to cut out "ambient" noises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This device works well for me.This is a good alternative to the much more expensive devices.I would think that it would work well for individuals with mild to moderate hearing loss which is my problem.It fits comfortably and is well made.It does not filter out background noise 100% but I think your brain would do this for you once you become accustomed to it.This is what is happening for me.I do not wear it all day but use it when using tv music phone or casual conversations.No problem with batteries drawing quickly which I purchase from Amazon.Very satisfied and would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: dannyjk

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancellation lacking
customer_reviews.text: Greater volume! But the noise canceling is not that good. Sounds like a sea shell or you’re in a stadium. Now that just might be my hearing. It may not be your symptoms with it. If the hearing aid industry would collaborate with the audio compression industry like Dolby Digital or DTS the possibilities of getting the Hearing Aid Amplifier to where it should be in 2020 might be possible. Audibly able to hear another person VOICE and able to listen to MUSIC without All the DISTORTION. Work together let’s get it RIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Smack787

customer_reviews.title: Decent amplifier but not that good if you have hearing loss
customer_reviews.text: A decent product for the price for amplification ONLY. Not too good for hearing impaired because of lots of background noise. Upgrade to the 900 model. You will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Cardsvc

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the amplifier (hearing) still working on the frequency ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the amplifier (hearing) still working on the frequency for one on one conversations in a some what busy environment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know what to think.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really know what to say about this. At the lowest setting it’s too loud for me. I have forced hot air heating and it picks up the wind noise and amplifies it so it is continual background noise. I also dont see much if any difference in the 4 settings. It’s very inexpensive and it may work for some. I prefer the Bose Hearphones which are much more adjustable but much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W. Bajan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great initially. My Dad could hear again but unfortunately it only lasted for two months then the unit died. Tried to change the batteries a few times and everything else to get it to work, but nothing. Had to scrap it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I at least was able to hear more than I was...
customer_reviews.text: My trouble is that I'm looking for a replacement of seven-year-old $6,000 hearing aids. And I know what good hearing feels like for sure. And to be able to sing in church and actually sing on key! This certainly didn't cut it in the least. At one point after struggling through a client call and a call with a good friend, I was desperate and went to Wal-Mart and found the last two copies of something called HD Smart Ear. They got me back to reality--but it's a shallow reality. I'm still searching. So glad this hearing device helps some folks!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stephen Lanning

customer_reviews.title: Good value to those with minimal hearing loss, follow the instructions to adjust to them
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for me although I have very very moderate hearing loss. And a reasonable price compared to $1200-$1600 for Ophthalmologist fitted hearing aids.I highly recommend following the instructions on how to get used to wearing them, it really helped in the adjustment period and now I barely notice they are in after the initial break in period. It is easy to use and so far the batteries have held up well although I only use them at school when I have trouble hearing some of my teachers who have low voices. Recommended, definitely worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: nekko925

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This unit fixed the TV is to loud thing. Fixed the crowded room noise to a point I could hear the person I was talking to. In all it took care of most of my 78 year old hearing problems without spending thousands of dollars. I can't be sure of the 500 hour battery life but I bet its pretty close. So far its worth every penny to me. I don't have to say "what was that" anymore.
customer_reviews.author: desoto

customer_reviews.title: I can hear!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited!! Received the britzgo amplifier today. I couldn't wait to try it but the company neglected to include the two batteries at advertised. I immediately called Britzgo and was connected to a wonderful young man named Chris. He made everything right. I ran to the store to buy the batteries. I can hear! No whistling or background noises on the first try. Amplifier fits perfectly...no dangling aid hanging off my ear. I'll keep you posted. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Mother Crone

customer_reviews.title: It was DOA. All I could hear was static ...
customer_reviews.text: It was DOA. All I could hear was static. I could increase the volume of the static, but never get any sound. I tried every mode and different batteries. Obviously I received a defective unit. I returned it for a refund. My primary intended use was for watching TV. I purchased lightweight earbuds with volume control and a 12 extension. Not as versatile as the Hearing Amplifier, but less expensive and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ileana & Wayne

customer_reviews.title: and I tell you it works wonderfully for my moderate to severe hearing loss
customer_reviews.text: I have spent thousands of dollars on hearing aids and have used small inner canal ear hearing aids for years. Well, my left inner canal hearing aid recently broke and I did not want to spend hundreds of dollars getting it repaired. I tried the Britzgo hearing aid which is my first time wearing a behind the ear hearing aid, and I tell you it works wonderfully for my moderate to severe hearing loss! Practically, better than any hearing aid I have worn so far! I'm thinking of purchasing another one as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: queen-c

customer_reviews.title: Has more Pros than Cons but there are things to think about...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little unit, it does work but you do get what you paid for. For me, the unit does work but if I had to do it over, I would spend the extra money and try the noise-canceling unit. With THIS unit, you hear everything...so expect a LOT of background noises too like window coming in through car window when driving, machinery running in the background, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dai Bando

customer_reviews.title: does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I've regret buying this product! I bought it for my mother but it's useless! she hears the enviromental sounds and the voices at the same time and the settings to reduce noise do not work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for the money but I wouldn't pay more
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for 3 or 4 years now it works pretty good for the money I can't compare it to something that would cost thousands of dollars but it seems to work pretty good for me my only regret is I didn't buy two to see if there was any Improvement in my hearing I only bought one
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cade

customer_reviews.title: Amplification Solution
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product for improvement of hearing. It is important that your hearing loss is simple aging! This is the vast majority of loss and just requires amplification. A small percentage have serious hearing loss with nerve damage requiring the 2 and 3 thousand price tab and simple amplification will not work. Unfortunately you will be sold the expensive ones! Unnecessary! This product is state of the art amplification and will solve your hearing problem
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJohn C

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: What I like most is IT WORKS!! I had a minor issue with the first one, contacted Britzgo and they said they would replace it "NO Cost"! They did (I received it today). Works great. I didn't know how much I was missing in conversations. Tried the more expensive ones & this is the best. $57.00 (I only need one). You can't go wrong. Thanks Britzgo!! It even helped my "selective hearing" with my wife. She's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hughes

customer_reviews.title: It works ok.
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered two. Having just one, makes one side hear better than the other. If the ear that it's in is next to a fan, or something that makes regular noise, it interferes with your normal hearing. The real downside to this product is that it's uncomfortable after having it on for a few hours. It's also bulky. This was my first attempt to improve my hearing. The next product I order will be less bulky and for both ears.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I wish it's fix my ear.so I can try out
customer_reviews.text: it's to big .you can see it next to my hearing aid.so I can't try it ..just return
customer_reviews.author: TARAEDGEmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was less than $100. It does an OK job. It really helps. I suppose, I could go out, and spend $2,000~$3,000 for a custom fit hearing aid – – and that expensive device would be better. But for less than $100, it’s hard to do better than this. It’s easy to use. The instructions are clear. The construction is... not as cheap as you might think. It’s not a first class device, but it does a good job. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Currently a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: About equal quality and much cheaper than the ones I bought five years ago. Based on the price of comparative electronics my opinion is that they could reduce the price by another 50% and still make a decent profit. Background noise is still noticeable. Voices behind you are nearly gone. They work well for conversations with someone you are looking at. If you plan to wear them all day, rechargeable might be better.
customer_reviews.author: Manong John

customer_reviews.title: What I would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is more of an amplifier than a hearing aid, but as a short term solution it is helpful. It's difficult to find a good balance in the volume so that that voices of people in the room and those of the TV are not disproportionately loud. Liked the large volume rocker and easy access to the battery compartment for my elderly relative. Not the absolute best one can find, but certainly better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennem

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work well at all - they amplified ambient noise even better than voices, which made it even more difficult to follow a conversation. The vendor was very accommodating about a refund and made a couple of suggestions about what might work better - so they get 5 stars. Unfortunately, I just can't say the same for their product.
customer_reviews.author: Mell

customer_reviews.title: Workd well
customer_reviews.text: My wife enjoyed hers except the fact that all of the inserts that goes in your ear were too big. She had a hard time getting hers to stay in. She left hers on the arm of her chair and let her two beagles in and they got.it. I am now looking for a replacement. Again, this one was well worth the money provided you don't have a small ear opening.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo Flats

customer_reviews.title: This is very good. I got it for my dad who is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very good. I got it for my dad who is 94 and has severe hearing loss. The small controls are a problem for him and he often leaves it on... (that's not the device's fault...) I bought a pack of extra batteries which solved that problem. I wear two Oticon hearing aids ($1500 EACH!) I've taken them out and tried the Britzgo. It's not as good but it's pretty close. I will get a pair for myself for spares and for when I'm working outside... if I lose a Britzgo, it's okay. If I lost an Oticon... yikes!
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Schellens

customer_reviews.title: Godd product. Not so good seller.
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted about a month. Seller Britzgo would not replace it. Like the hearing aid but the seller does not stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B

customer_reviews.title: Too much static noise
customer_reviews.text: The hiss was just too much. It's like putting in an earphone and tuning in to loud radio static. Also, it amplifies noise more than conversations.
customer_reviews.author: james bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great hearing amplifier
customer_reviews.text: My mother lost one $1500 hearing aid at the hospital so I bought this hearing aid as a temporary replacement. It turns out this hearing amplifier works better than her expensive lost hearing aid. She says it's comfortable and she can understand television voice for the first time in years. I've noticed it's much easier to have a conversation with her. I ordered this hearing amplifier one evening and it was at my door the next morning. Very satisfied with the hearing amplifier and my experience with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hearing Amplifier
customer_reviews.text: Nice Hearing Amplifier, it just wouldn't stay behind my ear because the rounded ear part was too thick. It's a great price though. Try it, it might work for you! What works for some, might not work for others. I just made sure when I purchased a hearing device, that I was allowed to return it (free shipping is a must). You need to keep the product for at least a week to give it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: The frequency band attenuation is not compatible with my need ...
customer_reviews.text: The frequency band attenuation is not compatible with my need such that it amplifies the noise and not the frequency I need .However, this guys are quick to respond and facilitated the return and refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to use and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, exactly as advertised, works well indoor or outdoor. Really amplifies sound and some modes work better outside than inside or in nature vs city/crowds. It has a slight hiss or background buzz but that is to be expected at this price point. For the price, it is good quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Marjus Plaku

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Just getting used to this now. It’s a lot bigger than I thought it would be. So far it seems okay. I will probably just use it at home because of the size. Some white noise while watching TV, but still playing around with the functions. Comes with three size ear pieces which is helpful to pick the right one. You also get two batteries. I wish it wasn’t so clumsy and large. Very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I'm able to hear people talk again.
customer_reviews.text: Do to an ear infection, I recently lost hearing in one of my ears. This is perfect. I can turn the volume down low enough so I'm able to hear when people talk to me so I'm not constantly asking them can you repeat what you said.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon purchase EVER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father, he had gotten so withdrawn from not being able to hear. This product has literally changed his life! Don’t be afraid to purchase this it is my BEST Amazon purchase EVER THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Kerley

customer_reviews.title: Just annoying aware
customer_reviews.text: Really annoying an sound is unnatural just not a good feel at all. Sent them back my advice is to buy hearingvaid.
customer_reviews.author: Frank James

customer_reviews.title: My Grandpa loved em but it died after just 4 months of use 😢😢😭😭😭
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandpa birth in Christmas and he called me last week about it that it has passed away after 4 months. He sent me back to troubleshoot but there was no luck or signs of life in this. I had discussed him about the item, he used to have them on when he used to go for some gatherings or praying and he loved it. It was quite a nice item though, it just that it didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain DiggerTop Contributor: Travel

customer_reviews.title: Great amplifier for seniors!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 92 years old grandma and it works just fine! I used to put the TV volume almost on maximum and with this amplifier it helped so much to the point where I can talk without yelling or putting the t.v. on max. Volume! Tottaly worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Hearing Device and Power One Batteries
customer_reviews.text: This Hearing Device is awesome! Hearing with it as well as one I paid a few thousand dollars for. The battery recieved with the unit has lasted over 528 hrs before replacement. This is incredible. Previous batteries lasted at best about 3 days. You have a winner with these products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a Friend. Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother's friend. He's old and has hearing loss (to the point where he experiences vertigo). My mother gave the hearing amplifier to him in March, and he's been using ever since. Therefore, I assume this product does its job well. It came securely packaged and, given the fact that it's lasted this long, must also have good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle Puffin

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy the expensive hearing aids again!
customer_reviews.text: My 90 year old mother has had about every hearing aid made. She began to lose them the last few years as she is getting older and forgetful. I seen this and thought I would give it a try. It has been great, she hears better than the expensive ones and the batteries last for weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: overall good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device for a family member who needs an extra bit of support for hearing in his everyday life. he stated that there is a bit of background noise/ static noise when he goes out and there is a lot going on around him but in an enclosed space everything is fine. he appreciates the support this device gives, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked around a lot before i bought this product. I had bough a $20 hearing amplifier before. It had a lot of noise and could barely hear anything. it stopped working entirely after 2 months. This product is so much better - five stars for everything (including customer service).
customer_reviews.author: Bramadath Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Works good for my hearing loss
customer_reviews.text: First off the amplifier works good, and seems to have long battery life. The downside is the obnoxious color (I really didn't think about that when I ordered it). It really is obvious that you have it on.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelTK

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable, works so well!
customer_reviews.text: Great devise. Works great, fit well, looks sharp. Smaller than most trendy ear buds. The price was extremely reasonable, in fact the price seemed too low ( perhaps even leading some to feel it must be a cheap unit) It is not a cheap novelty. It was so nice to see the smile on my wife's face when she could hear again after years of struggles. I highly recommend you buy one and try it.
customer_reviews.author: ThomasL

customer_reviews.title: LOTS of feedback noise.
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to use and the price was good. That being said.....I simply could not get rid of the feedback noise and it just made the unit useless for me. Sent it back. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Why does it have to be blue?
customer_reviews.text: Got this today and although it hasn't been long I'm very happy with the hearing quality and it is very comfortable.My only complaint is the color,why not flesh color?It shows if I absentmindedly push my hair even slightly behind my ear.even if the larger part is blue and just the earpiece was flesh it would work out!
customer_reviews.author: WOODY

customer_reviews.title: Eh....
customer_reviews.text: big and clunky, falls out of my ear, and if you were glasses even worse.
customer_reviews.author: D. Triche

customer_reviews.title: It's not a hearing aid but a great sound  filtering amplifier
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, my wife doesn't want a hearing aid. So, I looked around for an amplifier with good reviews. Took a chance and was well-rewarded. We've been enjoying TV, Music, and general conversations like we haven't been able to do for a long while. Not perfect, but it does what it says. I haven't heard, "WHAT'D YOU SAY?!?!" since she got it.
customer_reviews.author: Boat Man

customer_reviews.title: Dad's hearing.
customer_reviews.text: Sent one to my Dad who is really deaf. He said "Oh, my gosh, I can hear again." Nuff said. Am ordering 2 more (he loses stuff a lot), but even though he gets hearing aids from the VA, it takes a long time, and 2 trips to the VA which is an hour from his nursing home. And at this price, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Theokas

customer_reviews.title: Grand Father likes it and can hear better
customer_reviews.text: My GrandFather has a bit of hearing problem,so i bought this for him and he likes it as he can hear now better. This is easy to use and not so uncomfortable on the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen-suji

customer_reviews.title: Like White Noise? You Will Love This. Otherwise Fail.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of online purchasing and a return is rare for me. Sending this back. It amplifies a bit, but on any setting and at any volume it is like being in the kitchen with the vent fan on max. Some people like white noise machines, but that is not what this is advertised to be, and I was not in the market for a white noise generator.
customer_reviews.author: Rev Rider

customer_reviews.title: That you can hear better.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. Last couple of years my hearing is getting worse. I am deaf in one ear for 40 yrs so I really need to hear from the other hear. Really impressed that I can hear so well. It does not fit my ear well. Maybe it takes getting used to. I would like for it to stay put! Affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Amplifier
customer_reviews.text: You have a lot of background noice. Not for you if you have a yappy dog. I have a yorkie.
customer_reviews.author: RKKIMM

customer_reviews.title: I need to hear!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 89 year old Aunt, who just retired and whose hearing is terrible. She said the aid helped her considerably and I too believe it did. I tried to get her to get one for the other ear but she said the one was just fine. She did say, however, that she hears a constant humming while wearing it but she learned to put it out of her mind. She said, "yes" she does recommend it and would buy it again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line hearing aid
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my grandma’s birthday and her face lite up with being able to hear!!! Great price and come with an EXTRA battery, ear plugs and storage case! I’d buy another one for anyone who needs a hearing aid!!
customer_reviews.author: Bubble Gum

customer_reviews.title: Fed up with Fedex
customer_reviews.text: They work pretty well. It doesn’t help with back ground sound. I still hear it. But u get what u pay for. The only issue I have is Fedex. I have a package box and they put it in the door. There is even a sign that says to put the package there. I was home luckily. When I ask him why. He like oh I didn’t see it. The box is 2 foot square right next to my door. It’s hard to miss plus the sign.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've been almost completely dead in my right ear for years and always struggle to find the right hearing aid costed time and money with no avail, so I decided to try something new for once I got these and at first getting use to the background noise took a little time but being able to finally hear everything is the most amazing feeling I've had for years I cried. The sounds are so crystal clear and adjusting it with a simple click of a button makes it well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia c

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound !
customer_reviews.text: Works better than my old doctor installed hearing aids. The technology just keeps getting better. Bulky, but easy to adjust - you can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Garry W. Spencer

product_meta.title: Britzgo Digital Hearing Aid Amplifier Bha-220, 500hr Battery Life,"fda Approved", Blue, Blue, 5 Ounce
feature_bullets: Modern Stylish Design and Ready to Wear

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
